DOC.criteria: General Inclusion Criteria： 1 . Age : 1875Y 2 . Patients diagnose type 2 DM nonDM . Angiographic Inclusion Criteria： 1 . Patients consider eligible two significant ( > 70 % ) angiographic stenosis lesion different native coronary vessel CAG . 2 . Each target de novo lesion treat 12 stent . 3 . Reference vessel diameter 2.5 4.0 mm . General Exclusion Criteria： 1 . STsegment elevation myocardial infarction within 7 day prior index procedure . 2 . Life expectancy < 12 month due another medical condition . 3 . Contraindication antiplatelet therapy history hypersensitivity sirolimus paclitaxel structurally related compound . 4 . Creatinine level 2.0mg/dL ESRD . 5 . Severe hepatic dysfunction ( 3 time normal reference value ) . 6 . Planned surgery procedure≤12 month postindex procedure . 7 . Known allergy stainless steel . 8 . Female childbearing potential positive pregnancy test within 7 day index procedure , lactating , intend become pregnant 12 month post index procedure . 9 . Patient clinically appropriate OCT evaluation opinion investigator . Angiographic Exclusion Criteria： 1 . Study lesion ostial location ( within 3.0 mm vessel origin ) . 2 . Study lesion involve arterial segment highly tortuous anatomy . 3 . Complex lesion morphology ( bifurcation need two stent technique , leave main lesion , chronic obstructive occlusion , severe thrombus , heavy calcification ) .
